description: Continuation pattern showing consolidation within parallel horizontal support and resistance lines during an uptrend. Represents temporary pause before uptrend resumes.
validationRules: Must form during an established uptrend
Clear horizontal support and resistance levels
Price bounces between support and resistance at least twice
Breakout occurs upward through resistance with volume
Pattern usually takes 1-3 months to complete
invalidationSignals: Support or resistance lines slope significantly
commonMistakes: Trading inside the rectangle instead of waiting for breakout
Entering on fake breakouts - wait for volume confirmation
Not measuring rectangle height for target
Confusing with top/bottom formation in ranging market

tradeSetup.entry: Breakout above resistance with 1.5x average volume
tradeSetup.stopLoss: Below most recent swing low or below support line
tradeSetup.target: Height of rectangle added to breakout point

supportive: Volume decreases during formation, spikes on breakout
Moving averages still in bullish alignment

confluenceFactors: Forms in middle of strong trend (measured move)
Support aligns with key Fibonacci level
Forms after pullback to moving average
